commit message: #259 Implemented 'Sync over WiFi only'
#44 Refactoring: MyDatabase renamed to DatabaseHolder and moved to the new 'database' package
#44 Refactoring: Inner classes - '...Table' and OidEnum extracted from DatabaseHolder (ex. MyDatabase)
#44 Refactoring: DatabaseCreator extracted from DatabaseHolder (ex. MyDatabase)
#44 Refactoring: small changes...
#44 TimelineTable and CommandTable added. Database v.25
#44 DatabaseConverter works
#44 ChangeLog is opened after upgrade
#44 CommandQueue class created
#44 Command Queue is stored in a database
AccountSelector and TimelineTypeSelector migrated to DialogFragment
Removed unused parameter from TimelineTypeSelector
#384 Small amount of 'TimelineTypes' is being replaced with individual timelines (of the same types) per Account. Transition is in progress.
#384 Timeline replaced TimelineType and other fields in TimelineListParameters
#384 Timeline replaced TimelineType in CommandData
#384 Cleaned CommandEnum
Gradle plugin updated
#384 UserName and Origin are handled by Timeline
#384 Latest ('youngest') synced positions are store in a Timeline table now
#384 Unneeded columns, related to timelines, removed from a UserTable
#384 Default timelines are added to all accounts after upgrade using app code, not as database inserts.
#384 Timeline configuration-related classes (excluding TimelineActivity-related, i.e. excluding showing timelines of messages) are moved to their own package
Fixed a problem with stalled command execution in a SYNC pool (and in others also...)
#384 tests moved to 'timeline' package
#384 Added 'Manage timelines' setting, showing existing timelines. Not editable yet.
#384 State of 'Synced' and 'Displayed in selector' checkboxes may be changed directly in the 'Manage timelines' activity.
MySwipeRefreshLayout is optional for LoadableListActivity
#384 List header added to the 'Manage timelines' activity.
Fixed placement of SwipeRefreshLayout and DrawerLayout: they should be deeper, don't cover action bar
#384 New TimelineTypes added: SENT, MY_FRIENDS and MY_FOLLOWERS to ease validation/selection. Started to get rid of commands for several accounts/origins.
#384 Got rid of multi-step commands. Removed AUTOMATIC_UPDATE command as now only concrete commands e.g. 'FETCH_TIMELINE' are put into a queue.
#384 Information on sync date and successes/failures are stored in a TimelineTable for each timeline.
#384 TimelineActivity is switched to a Timeline, not to a TimelineType. 'isCombined' is a property of a Timeline.
#384 Small fix of TimelineTitle
#384 Improving Timeline object concept
#384 Changelog updated
#44 Last viewed timeline position is stored in a database (and not in SharedPreferences, as before)
Fixed timeline list initialization
Timeline is really deleted from a database
Fixed switching between timelines
Fixed switching between timelines
Timeline list improved: new columns plus column sorting
User name, shown in a timeline title, now is stored in a timeline to avoid a need for additional database requests
#384 Automatic syncing honors last time each timeline was synced automatically and skips syncing if period is less than configured, reporting 'success' to Android syncing service.
#384 Fixed syncing combined timelines and Public timeline
Search TimelineType introduced
New timelines are saved

Search unified with other timeline types. For Twitter API it started to use 'since_id' request parameter to get only newer messages, not all as before. See https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/get/search/tweets
Unfortunately, this doesn't seem to work in GNU Social.
Improved sorting for 'Manage Timelines'. Fixed new message counting for not Home timelines.
Fixed tests (almost). Improved detection, when a timeline can be synced
Timelines, which are at Social Network (e.g. Public and Search) may be included into automatic sync. Fixed checkboxes on a Timeline list.
Sort column and direction are shown
Account and Social Network - in separate columns of the Timeline List
Fixed creation of duplicated timelines

Added to Account settings: 'Synced automatically' checkbox and 'Last synced' time.
Improved figuring out, if a Timeline is syncable.
Layout improved for Account and Timeline selectors. 'X' shows if Account/Timeline is syncable
Fixed position restore after timeline switch
Options menu and Context menu added to 'Manage Timelines'. Options: Refresh and Reset counters. Context menu: Sync now.
#366 Fixed a bug, which made log files too short
Network messages' logfile names shortened a bit
Fixed syncing User timeline. To 'Manage Timelines', context menu added: 'Delete' and 'Open timeline messages' items.
'Displayed in a Timeline selector' checkbox now can have three values: 'Always' value allows to show the Timeline in every context (i.e. no matter in Combined is set, or what Account selected.

Added the 'Dnl.' column to the 'Manage Timelines' table, which shows a number of messages downloaded (in addition to a number of 'New' messages, which exists in this table). So you can see, if AndStatus downloads unnecessary/duplicated messages during syncing.
#77 Added an option to set Sync frequency of any individual account to a custom value or to a common default value set for all accounts in Settings->Syncing->Default Sync frequency
Default timeline, which is shown on Application start, is selected in the 'Manage Timelines' list
Soft keyboard shouldn't be shown on Account Settings open
Don't crash, when AsyncTask Launcher failed to launch unimportant task, e.g. avatar download.
Fixed crash on opening Conversation from a Search timeline
#259 Documented implementation of 'Sync over WiFi only' option
Fixed 'someuser@gs.kawa-kun.com' was not considered a valid WebfingerId
Fixed Widget and Notifications on new messages (but no reliable tests yet)
